com.shsrobotics.reinforcementlearning.optimizers

Interface Optimizer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultOptimizer

    public interface Optimizer
    Optimizes a series of coordinates to either maximize or minimize a given function.

    Author:
    team 2412.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double f(double[] input)
      The function to optimize.
      double[] maximize()
      Minimize the function.
      double[] minimize()
      Minimize the function.

    • Method Detail

      • minimize

        double[] minimize()
        Minimize the function. Implementations should use final keyword.
        Returns:
        the minimized coordinates

      • maximize

        double[] maximize()
        Minimize the function. Implementations should use final keyword.
        Returns:
        the maximized coordinates.

      • f

        double f(double[] input)
        The function to optimize. Implementations should use abstract keyword.
        Parameters:
        input - the domain (input).
        Returns:
        the range (output).
